about_the_game:
Yes! We are not angry, but we are hungry! We all love the delicious donuts!

Our little kitties are under hungry to death. The most delicious food, donuts, are in font of kitty’ eyes. Find the best way to feed our hungry kitty! Hungry Kitty Donuts Mania features hours of gameplay, challenging physics-based puzzle, and lots of replay value. Each level requires logic and skill to resolve.

---------------------
Features:
---------------------
FUN-DEAD LEVELS
Conquer all 180 levels of Adventure mode!

REALISTIC GRAVITY
Challenging physics-based puzzle!

AMAZING DEGSIGN
Best soundtrack and charming retina graphics

---------------------
How to play:
---------------------
- Simply flip your mouse to shoot the donuts
- Complete the level by feeding the hungry kitty
- Get perfect score by collecting all fruits

---------------------
MORE GAMES
---------------------
- Clumsy Knight
- Clumsy Knights : Threats of Dragon
- Hungry Piggy vs Chicken

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

name: Hungry Kitty Donuts Mania

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
